page.title: 12OTHER FARMS
page.content: There are 2 farms at the western edge of the survey area. This also includes some land of the Cold Norton Experimental Farm. 1. MICKLOW HOUSE FARM (163 acres) Owned and farmed by Deane Bros. The chief crops grown are grass, barley and wheat. Flat farm on medium soils on clay. It is a beef and arable farm with 2 workers employed. 2. NORTON FARM (198 acres) Owned and farmed by Mr W.F.Ball. The farm deals mainly in grass and corn. The grass is used to rear beef cattle. It is flat with heavy soil on clay. 1 worker is employed on the farm.
